keyMoments.title: Usopp Returns as Sogeking
keyMoments.description: Though not officially rejoining the crew, Usopp appears as Sogeking to help rescue Robin, showing that his bond with the crew transcends his pride.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that despite the painful separation, Usopp's loyalty to his nakama remains unbroken, setting up his eventual return.

keyMoments.title: Crew Receives Upgraded Weapons
keyMoments.description: The crew displays new equipment and preparations for the assault on Enies Lobby, including Nami's Perfect Clima-Tact.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's growth and preparation for facing the World Government.

ships.description: The crew's first ship, still being discussed during this episode despite being left behind at Water 7.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
